options.create_group: How to create a group or community?

options.register_content: To register, click the 'Register' button on the homepage, then fill out the form with your details to create an account.
options.add_friend_content: Go to the user's profile and click the 'Add Friend' or 'Follow' button to track their updates.
options.modify_account_content: To modify account settings or delete your account, go to the 'Settings' section in the profile menu and choose the relevant option.
options.create_group_content: To create a group, go to the 'Communities' section and click the 'Create Community' button, then fill out the form with the necessary information.
options.change_avatar_content: To change your profile photo, go to profile settings and click the current photo. After that, choose a new image from your gallery.
options.change_password_content: To change your password, go to account settings, select the 'Security' section, and follow the instructions to change your password.
options.recover_account_content: If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot password?' on the login page, enter your email, and we will send you instructions to recover your account.
